text: (Shikashi) anata gata no meiyaku shita tashinkyo to de, hayaku shita koto naku, mata sonogo, anata gata ni tekitai suru mono o tasukenakatta mono wa betsudearu. (Korera no mono ni taishite wa) kikan ga manryo suru made, kare-ra to no meiyaku o hatashi nasai. Hontoni arra wa,-nushi o osoreru mono o mede rareru
